feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Testing and Analysis
feed.subtitle: ABAP Testing and Analysis Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: BP is not creating with respect to new customer creation
entry.content:
I used the class CMD_EI_API and the method MAINTAIN_DIRECT_INPUT to pass customer data into the deep structure. It successfully updated the customer in table KNA1, but the Business Partner (BP) was not created. I checked the BP records and confirmed it wasn’t generated. Please let me know how to resolve this

   CALL METHOD cmd_ei_api=>maintain_direct_input
      EXPORTING
        iv_collect_messages  = gc_x
        is_master_data       = ls_customer
      IMPORTING
        es_message_defective = ls_error.

entry.title: How to run ATC checks only on code delta of a changed object?
entry.content:
We are currently using the on-premise 2021 version of our S/4 HANA system. We would like to understand the procedure for running ATC (ABAP Test Cockpit) checks specifically on delta code changes, rather than executing checks on the entire object each time.
 
Could you please provide us with information or documentation on how to configure and execute ATC checks to focus only on the modifications made to the code?

entry.title: MiniSAP or BPP / AS Abap Dev Edition with MaxDB Database
entry.content: Hello! Does anybody know where could I find the old installation files (or maybe an installed virtual image) with a SAP Minisap, BPP (Business Best Practices installation) or the NPL running with MaxDB? I have some tests to do with MaxDB, and currently there is only the installation files for ASE in the "Trials" SAP Page; I don't need any Table data/transaction from Business Modules; Thanks!

entry.title: S/4HANA Readiness Check for an enhancement running into "SAP-owned namespace /0SJ1P/ is in scope..."
entry.content:
Hi All!

I'm currently involved with a Brownfield conversion of our SAP-system (see here and here for context) and am in the process to put together ATC-results based on the S4HANA_READINESS_2023 check variant. This is happening in a recently converted development system which is now on SAP_BASIS 758 SP2 and which started live as a copy from a NW750 EHP8 development system. I'm getting ATC results for most of our custom objects but am running into issues for our large enhancement of SAPMV45A where I get tool failure "The SAP-owned namespace /0SJ1P/ is in scope. SAP objects cannot be checked in this case."

I already searched for mentions of this error and happened upon @EnnoWulff's question with @BjoernJueliger's detailed response where the only difference seems to be that Enno had "/0SJ1G/" in the message while for me it's "/0SJ1P/".

I already ran the report SATC_AC_INIT_NAMESPACE_REG mentioned in Note 3063877 but this particular namespace isn't listed there. In table TRNSPACE the namespace is listed with a "P" but that is also the case in the counterpart dev system which is still on NW750. When I run a remote S/4HANA_READINESS_2023 check in that system I do get a long list of findings (as expected) and I expect to see the same issues identified in the new S/4HANA system.

Our enhancement has always been in a Z-package.

What else can I check on my own? Or is it better to create on OSS incident right away with information based on the above?

Thanks much and Cheers

Bärbel

P.S.: please ignore the formatting which I have no means to correct at the moment but which has already been mentioned in comments to the blog post about the new "Glow" design for SAP Community.

entry.title: How to display the fields vertically
entry.content:
Hi there! please how can I show the fields vertically in one column under title "Description"

 

FORM f_prepare_AFFECT_DATA2.

CALL METHOD obj_test->prepare_affect_resultat2
  EXPORTING
    it_grp_nature    = gt_grp_nature
    it_description_a =  gt_affect_a2                 
  IMPORTING
    et_affect2_alv   =  gt_alv_affect2               
  .

ENDFORM.

FORM show_affect2.

  DATA: lt_fieldcat TYPE lvc_t_fcat,
        ls_fieldcat TYPE lvc_s_fcat,
        ls_layout   TYPE lvc_s_layo.

  g_subscreen = '0107'.

  " Define Field Catalog
  CLEAR ls_fieldcat.
  ls_fieldcat-fieldname = 'REPORT_NOUVEAU'.
  ls_fieldcat-coltext   = 'Report Nouveau'.
  APPEND ls_fieldcat TO lt_fieldcat.

  CLEAR ls_fieldcat.
  ls_fieldcat-fieldname = 'RESULTAT_NET_I'.
  ls_fieldcat-coltext   = 'Résultat Net I'.
  APPEND ls_fieldcat TO lt_fieldcat.

  CLEAR ls_fieldcat.
  ls_fieldcat-fieldname = 'RESULTAT_NET_E'.
  ls_fieldcat-coltext   = 'Résultat Net E'.
  APPEND ls_fieldcat TO lt_fieldcat.

  CLEAR ls_fieldcat.
  ls_fieldcat-fieldname = 'PRELEVEMENT'.
  ls_fieldcat-coltext   = 'Prélèvement'.
  APPEND ls_fieldcat TO lt_fieldcat.

  CLEAR ls_fieldcat.
  ls_fieldcat-fieldname = 'AUTRE_PRELEVEMENT'.
  ls_fieldcat-coltext   = 'Autre Prélèvement'.
  APPEND ls_fieldcat TO lt_fieldcat.

  ls_layout-zebra = abap_true.

  " Container and Grid Initialization
  IF go_container IS NOT BOUND.

    CREATE OBJECT go_container
      EXPORTING
        container_name              = 'CC_ALV1'
      EXCEPTIONS
        cntl_error                  = 1
        cntl_system_error           = 2
        create_error                = 3
        lifetime_error              = 4
        lifetime_dynpro_dynpro_link = 5
        OTHERS                      = 6.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
      MESSAGE ID sy-msgid TYPE sy-msgty NUMBER sy-msgno
                 WITH sy-msgv1 sy-msgv2 sy-msgv3 sy-msgv4.
    ENDIF.
  ENDIF.

  CHECK go_container IS BOUND.

  IF go_grid IS NOT BOUND.

    CREATE OBJECT go_grid
      EXPORTING
        i_parent = go_container
      EXCEPTIONS
        error_cntl_create = 1
        error_cntl_init   = 2
        error_cntl_link   = 3
        error_dp_create   = 4
        OTHERS            = 5.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
      MESSAGE ID sy-msgid TYPE sy-msgty NUMBER sy-msgno
                 WITH sy-msgv1 sy-msgv2 sy-msgv3 sy-msgv4.
    ENDIF.

  ENDIF.

  CALL METHOD go_grid->set_table_for_first_display
    EXPORTING
      is_layout       = ls_layout
    CHANGING
      it_outtab       = gt_alv_affect2
      it_fieldcatalog = lt_fieldcat.

ENDFORM.

Normally it show like this:

But I want to show it like this:

Thank you

entry.title: How to set up an ATC check run for enhancements in an S/4HANA 758 system?
entry.content:
Hi All!

After resolving the issue with getting an ATC tool failure when checking enhancements in an S/4HANA 758 system, I'm now trying to include enhancements in a check run but the provided objects are ignored and no check happens from what I can tell.

I'm including both the enhancement names in our Z-namespace as well as the enhanced SAP objects SAPMV45A and SAPMV50A but compared to a NW 750 system I can no longer explicitely include enhanced objects as the checkbox no longer exists:

Regardless of which combination of object set or free object selection I try, the check ends after a few seconds as if it's not even looking at any of the objects to check:

When I run a comparable check in our central ATC system which is on S/4HANA 756 for an enhancement of SAPMV45A in a NW 750 system, it runs a couple of minutes and produces a result with expected findings:

Does anybody know what the trick is to get a comparable result for enhancements in an S/4HANA 758 system?

This is what I provide when defining the check run, both in the central ATC-system for a check in NW 750 and the new S4HANA development system:

Thanks much and cheers

Bärbel

Update June 13, 2025: In the meantime I raised an OSS-incident which is currently in process by SAP. I'll provide updates as I learn more about this issue.

entry.title: closed
entry.content: closed

Is it Possible or not If  please tell How??

entry.title: Move selection screen parameters data to my table fields
entry.content:
Dear SAP users,

I have a question, I want to copy the values of fields in ly selection-screen to the fields of my custom table.

For the selection screen, I have 

PARAMETERS: p_bukrs like T001-BUKRS OBLIGATORY . 

SELECT-OPTIONS: so_budat FOR ACDOCA-BUDAT OBLIGATORY.

And I have a custom table with fields:

COMPANY_CODE DATA ELEMENT BUKRS

DATE_HIGH DATA ELEMENT DATE

DATE_LOW DATA ELEMENT DATE

Now I want to copy the data of selection screen like this:

COMPANY_CODE =  p_bukrs 

DATE_HIGH = so_budat-high 

DATE_LOW = so_budat-low

I wrote some code, I did a point debug and I found that it come with data for p_bukrs, so_budat-high andso_budat-low but when it come to sy-subrc it give me 4

FORM move_data.
  LOOP AT gt_alv INTO DATA(ls_alv).
    DATA: gt_alv8 TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ztfi_affec_a,
          gs_alv8 TYPE ztfi_affec_a.

    SELECT * FROM ztfi_affec_a INTO TABLE gt_alv8
      WHERE company_code = p_bukrs
        AND date_low >= so_budat-low
        AND date_high <= so_budat-high.

    LOOP AT gt_alv8 INTO gs_alv8.
      gs_alv8-date_high    = so_budat-high.
      gs_alv8-date_low     = so_budat-low.
      gs_alv8-company_code = p_bukrs.
         IF sy-subrc = 0.
           ENDIF.

      SELECT SINGLE * FROM ztfi_affec_a INTO @DATA(ls_exist)
        WHERE company_code = @GS_alv8-company_code
         AND date_high = @GS_alv8-date_high
          AND date_low = @GS_alv8-date_low.

      IF sy-subrc = 0.
        UPDATE ztfi_affec_a FROM gs_alv8.
      ELSE.
        INSERT ztfi_affec_a FROM gs_alv8.
      ENDIF.
    ENDLOOP.
  ENDLOOP.
ENDFORM.

entry.title: How to link screen-painter element to custom table
entry.content:
Hi,

I created an input field using screen painter name 'DATE_AGO' with search helper 'BU_DATE_CHAR', I chose the search helper because I want it like under date format. I have declared in the TOP include a global variable DATA: DATE_AGO TYPE SY-DATUM. 

Now  when I run my project, and I fill that field with date, when I click on enter it automatically clear by it's self, and when I run the debug and I point on the variable name it's empty 00000000.

Here's the affectation of the variable data to the field of my custom table:

 gs_affec_a-date_ago = date_ago.

DATA: DATE_AGO TYPE SY-DATUM.

Please note that I'm not using any clear or something that let the variable be cleared automatically.

entry.title: ATC - Sap readiness check for 2023 S4 - error The SAP-owned namespace /0SJ1P/ is in scope. SAP objec
entry.content:
Hello All - 

 

we are running ATC for custom objects in brownfield approach , we are getting error as below - 
The SAP-owned namespace /0SJ1P/ is in scope. SAP objects cannot be checked in this case.

 

these error are appearing , when we are running for VOFM routein .. 
now the challenge is  - /0SJ1P/ in table "TRNSPACE " is have following values - 

NAMESPACE /0SJ1P/

ROLE P
LICENSE
EDITFLAG X
SSCRFLAG
SAPFLAG X
GEN ONLY
MT TYPE

i ve checked multiple blogs , there has been no solution provide people has tried multiple things , but still a final solution and approach is missing .


thanks

entry.title: DB Operation SELECT found (BSEG, see Note(s):0002431747) - ATC - S4 readiness
entry.content:
ALL -  during ATC run - error for below in the custom code

Appl. Comp. Check / Check Class / Message Code

BC-DWB-CEX-CCM / CL_CI_TEST_S4H_SEARCH_DB_OPS / SELECT

Details of Analysis

  • DB Operation SELECT found (BSEG, see Note(s):0002431747)

 

  • Finding can be suppressed with pseudo comment "#EC CI_DB_OPERATION_OK[2431747]
  • Referenced Object: BSEG (TABL)
  • Referenced Application Component: FI-GL-GL
  • Change Category of Piecelist Items: T (Technical)
  • SAP Note Number: 0002431747 (General Ledger: Incompatible changes in S
  • Simplification Item Category: I (Syntactically incompatible change of existing functionality)

 

is the above error ( red flag ) in the ATC need to ignore if so what we need to consider - 

 

- Since we are reading data from the BKPF/BSEG - that is for the GL account hence we are good ?

- there is no update / modify , insert - so we are good ?

- SAP recommend the data will still persist in BKPF/BSEG,  equivalent API & CDS are not required ? 

 

#abaper community - how are you handling it ... 

thanks

aakash

entry.title: ABAP CDS - C_CostCenterPlanActQ2001
entry.content:
Hello Expert,

Need help to analyze the standard CDS - C_CostCenterPlanActQ2001

When I open proivew in Eclipse I can see set of parameter define in this view.

But same CDS when I open in AFO or RSRT, I can see additional parameter (Like Ledger Fiscal year) which is mandatory and restrciting the output for the selection. PFA.

Please help me to identify where this additional parameter is maintained.

Thank You

Vinod

SAP S/4HANA Embedded Analytics Data and Analytics SAP Analysis for Microsoft Office

entry.title: Clarification about storage path- GOS_ATTACHMENT_LIST_POPUP
entry.content:
Hi Folks,

Recently, I used the function module GOS_ATTACHMENT_LIST_POPUP to create and display attachments for one of the purchasing transactions (ME11/ME12). The functionality works as expected.

However, considering the high frequency of attachments created by users in these transactions and the fact that we are not using a content server, there is a concern about storage usage, since all attachments are stored directly in the SAP Office.

I would like to know:

  1. Where exactly are these attachments stored in the SAP database/ SAPoffice.

  2. I have already explored some important tables such as:

  • SRGBTBREL
  • SOOD
  • SOFM
  • SOC3
  • SOFFCONT1

  1. I need to understand how these tables are linked and how I can trace and retrieve the binary content of attachments from them.

  2. Also, I would like to confirm which table stores the actual binary content.

  3. Finally, I need to determine the size of the table that holds the binary data to assess the storage impact.

Any insights on the linkage and storage structure of GOS attachments in a non-content server setup would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks for your time!

entry.title: Issue with ALV Filter Field Length Display for One Specific User
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I'm facing a strange issue with an ALV report in our SAP system.

We have a custom-defined field in the ALV output . On most user accounts, both the ALV display and the filter (selection screen) show the full 12-character length correctly.

However, for one specific user account, the filter input field only displays 10 characters, even though the ALV column itself still shows all 12 characters. This causes part of the filter value to be truncated when entering or selecting data, which affects filtering accuracy.

Has anyone experienced a similar issue? Could this be related to a user-specific layout, GUI settings, or authorization?

Any suggestions or troubleshooting tips would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Addition of custom fields to the relationship of BP transaction
entry.content:
Hi Gurus,

After doing research, I have added one custom field to the structure BUPR_RELSHP_OVR_EXT . I could able to see the newly added field as shown below after adding field to this structure.

When I am trying to edit with the below edit option it is not showing the newly added field to input value into it.

and how to make it editable so that user will enter percentage value and it gets saved in the db table ?

Thanks.

entry.title: Changing LGORT for WM Staging (CO02/LB10)
entry.content:
Hey Guys,

I need your help.

My case: I create and release a new production order, execute WM Material Staging and set a TO (Foreground / Background) in Transfer Requirements. 

I want to have a different LTBP-LGORT for the material. The system takes RESBD-LGORT as standard, but I need it dynamically choosen by certain conditions . This should be done automatically in an user-exit or enhancement point.

Sadly I haven't found any suitable user-exit for that. PPCO0005, MWMTR001 or MWMTO001 don't get called (Yes, active project in CMOD) and MWMPP001 can't be used to change LGORT.

Any ideas, how I can get this done?
Please don't be to harsh to me, I'm new to SAP 😮

Greetings
Patrick

entry.title: When I called BAPI_SALESORDER_CHANGE, "Update was canceled" received from author "CHENG_MR".
entry.content:
When I called BAPI_SALESORDER_CHANGE, the internal table RETURN did not contain any error messages. However, immediately after execution, a popup appeared saying:

"Express document 'Update was canceled' received from author 'CHENG_MR'"

Why did this happen? Below is the code I wrote.

DATA : ls_partner          TYPE bapiparnr,
       lt_return           TYPE TABLE OF bapiret2,
       Lt_PARTNER          TYPE TABLE OF bapiparnr,
       ls_partnerchanges   TYPE  bapiparnrc,
       Lt_PARTNERCHANGES   TYPE TABLE OF bapiparnrc,
       ls_partneraddresses TYPE  bapiaddr1,
       lv_order_header_inx TYPE  bapisdh1x,
       Lt_PARTNERADDRESSES TYPE TABLE OF bapiaddr1.

DATA: lv_adrnr TYPE kna1-adrnr.

SELECT SINGLE adrnr INTO lv_adrnr
  FROM kna1
  WHERE kunnr = '0000001100'.


CLEAR:lt_return,lt_partner.
lv_order_header_inx-updateflag = 'U'.

ls_partner-partn_role  = 'AG'.

ls_partner-partn_numb  = '0000001100'.
ls_partner-country     = 'CN'.
ls_partner-name        = 'laogao'.
ls_partner-postl_code = '112222'.
ls_partner-city       = 'chang'.
ls_partner-street      = '222222'.
ls_partner-telephone   = '1777777777'.
APPEND ls_partner TO lt_partner.
CLEAR:ls_partner.


ls_partnerchanges-updateflag = 'U'.
ls_partnerchanges-document   = '1100000397'.
ls_partnerchanges-itm_number = '000000'.
ls_partnerchanges-partn_role = 'AG'.
ls_partnerchanges-p_numb_old = '0000001100'.
ls_partnerchanges-p_numb_new = '0000001100'.
*ls_partnerchanges-addr_link  = lv_adrnr.
APPEND ls_partnerchanges TO lt_partnerchanges.
CLEAR ls_partnerchanges.

ls_partneraddresses-country = 'CN'.
*ls_partneraddresses-addr_no = lv_adrnr.
ls_partneraddresses-name    = 'ruirui'.
ls_partneraddresses-tel1_numbr  = '16666666666'.
ls_partneraddresses-street  = 'Street'.
ls_partneraddresses-postl_cod2  = '010704'.
APPEND ls_partneraddresses TO lt_partneraddresses.
CLEAR ls_partneraddresses.

CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_SALESORDER_CHANGE'
  EXPORTING
    salesdocument    = '1100000397'
    order_header_inx = lv_order_header_inx
  TABLES
    return           = lt_return
    partners         = lt_partner
    partnerchanges   = lt_partnerchanges
    partneraddresses = lt_partneraddresses.

CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT'
  EXPORTING
    wait = 'X'.


REFRESH:lt_partner,lt_partnerchanges.

entry.title: Problem with epescp9
entry.content:
Estoy imprimiendo un smartforms, utilizando una impresora configurad con epescp9, el documento en su vista de visualización de la sp01, me lo muestra bien 

Pero al momento de lanzarlo en mi impresora local DFX-9000 por algun motivo,   la  fila 5, 7, 9 y 10, las deja concatenadas a la anterior,  por lo cual me deja el documento mal.

a alguien le ha pasado?
